alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; NW Blount; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 12:47PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BLOUNT AND SOUTHEASTERN SEVIER COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM EDT... At 147 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, or 14 miles southeast of Maryville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Gatlinburg, Smoky Mountains-Clingmans Dome, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Townsend, Cades Cove, Elkmont, Great Smoky Mountains National Park, and Roundtop Mountain State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; NW Blount; Sevier Smoky Mountains
